name: Purifying Ampoule
typesDescription: Oil & Anti-Acne Serum. Controls Oil & Reduces Acne – Regulates excess sebum to prevent acne. Fights Bacteria Naturally – Tea Tree Oil targets acne-causing bacteria. Promotes Clear Skin – Supports a healthier, radiant complexion.

features.fearutesDescription: Made with 97.74% natural-origin ingredients. Regulates excess oil and hydrates skin simultaneously. After use, apply foundation/day cream or night cream. Clinically tested for oily skin only. 10 subjects/56 days of sebaceous secretion are controlled.

use.useDescription: Apply onto cleansed skin. Use twice daily. Gently massage until absorbed.

ingrediants.activeIngrediants: Aqua, Hydrolyzed Yeast Protein, Glycerin, Propylene Glycol, C12-15 Pareth-12, Diazolidinyl Urea, Pyridoxine HCL, Niacinamide, Melaleuca Alternifolia Leaf Oil, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Disodium EDTA, Buteth-3, Panthenol, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Sodium Hyaluronate, CI 42090, Allantoin, Tributyl Citrate, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate, Biotin, Sodium Sulfate, CI19140.

moreIngrediants.title: Niacinamide
moreIngrediants.description: Brightens and evens skin tone and redness. Minimizes pores and keeps skin hydrated and smooth.

moreIngrediants.title: Tea Tree Oil
moreIngrediants.description: Natural antibacterial agent that helps reduce acne-causing bacteria and soothes inflammation.

moreIngrediants.title: Hyaluronic Acid
moreIngrediants.description: Naturally in the skin, Sodium Hyaluronate draws moisture, keeps skin hydrated, smooth, and supports youthful collagen.

moreIngrediants.title: Hydrolyzed Yeast Protein
moreIngrediants.description: Nourishes, hydrates, and soothes skin while strengthening and improving texture.

name: Radiant Glow Serum
typesDescription: This Serum is specially formulated to reduce brown spots and brighten the skin tone by promoting a more uniform complexion. It smoothens skin texture and enhances skin clarity, giving a radiant look from within. The skin becomes noticeably softer and more supple.

features.fearutesDescription: Helps to Prevent and Reduce Brown Spots. 85%  users saw improved tone & reduced pigmentation. Restore the lipidic structure of the skin. Improves Skin Clarity and Brightness

use.useDescription: Apply a few serum pumps to your palms and lightly pat the serum onto your face until it is absorbed. Use twice daily for optimal results, followed by your preferred moisturizer.

ingrediants.activeIngrediants: Aqua, Butylene Glycol, Squalane, Glycerin, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil, Polyacrylate-13, Propylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Polyisobutene, Narcissus Poeticus Callus Extract, Diazolidinyl Urea, Disodium EDTA, Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil, Polysorbate 20, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Iodopropynyl Butylcarbamate.

moreIngrediants.title: Citrus Reticulata Peel Extract
moreIngrediants.description: Boosts clarity and inner glow for radiant skin.

moreIngrediants.title: Squalane
moreIngrediants.description: Restores lipid barrier, locks in hydration, enhances softness.

name: Brilliant White Emulsion
typesDescription: Brightens skin & enhances natural radiance. Improves texture & evens out skin tone. Leaves skin softer, smoother & more supple.

features.fearutesDescription: 3x more effective in inhibiting tyrosinase than Hydroquinone. Deeply moisturizes the skin and enhances skin texture. Brightens and evens out skin tone. Potent anti-inflammatory and anti-oxidant protection. Reduce skin irritation approximately 100%

use.useDescription: Apply every night after cleansing and toning. Gently massage into your skin. Let the cream fully absorb into the skin.

ingrediants.activeIngrediants: Aqua, Butylene Glycol, Propylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, Niacinamide, Glycerin, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Sulfur Sodium Polyacrylate, Cyclohexasiloxane, PEG/PPG-17/6 Copolymer, Dipropylene Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Carbomer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Centella Asiatica Extract, Caprylyl glycol, Trideceth-6, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Tetrasodium EDTA, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Polygonum Cuspidatum Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Camphor, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Fragrance, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Extract, Morus Alba Root Extract, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Peel Oil.

moreIngrediants.title: Morus Alba Root Extract
moreIngrediants.description: Morus Alba Root Extract (4%) contains phenylflavonoids that effectively inhibit tyrosinase, demonstrating superior skin-brightening efficacy compared to Ascorbic Acid, Kojic Acid, and Hydroquinone. It also possesses anti-inflammatory and moisturizing properties, supporting overall skin health.

moreIngrediants.title: Niacinamide
moreIngrediants.description: Niacinamide (2%) is a derivative of Vitamin B3 that promotes skin brightening by inhibiting the transfer of melanin to the outer skin layers. It also supports epidermal protein synthesis, enhancing overall skin texture and clarity.

moreIngrediants.title: Herbal Complex
moreIngrediants.description: Herbal Complex (5%) is a proprietary blend of seven Korean plant extracts that provides anti-inflammatory and antioxidant effects, specifically for irritated skin. Clinically evaluated, it has demonstrated significant reduction in sensory irritation and is ECOCERT certified.

moreIngrediants.title: Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Oil
moreIngrediants.description: Citrus Aurantium Dulcis Oil (Orange Oil) is a natural essential oil derived from the peel of oranges. It provides a refreshing and uplifting fragrance while contributing a subtle, invigorating aroma to the formulation, enhancing the overall sensory experience of the product.
